revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R8300 |revision=-100NAS
(Nighthawk X8) |series=AC5000 |asin=B01NA7F6Y9 |price=300 |fcc_date=05/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY315200309 |ic_id=4054A-15200309 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47094 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=6 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;8; ,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, LACP, DFS |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps - 2x 4-stream 802.11ac device (80MHz 5GHz, 1024QAM), :• 1x '''600''' Mbps - max. PHY rate 802.11n (40MHz 2.4GHz, 64QAM) = '''''5000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X8 AC5000 Smart WiFi Router}} :''802.11ac Tri-Band Quad Stream Gigabit'' :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R8300.aspx#tab-techspecs}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R8300}} While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are '''BCM4366''' (''FullMAC'') This is an artificially limited [[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices|Costco]] exclusive model. :In this case, the R8300 is a R8500 with NitroQAM (1024QAM) and TurboQAM (256QAM) :disabled on the four stream 2.4GHz 802.11n radio limiting its maximum theoretical :speed to 600Mbps instead of 1000Mbps. Also, the USB 2.0 port was removed for R8300. {{see also|Netgear R8500}} ===Product features=== *Get fastest speeds available up to 5.0 Gbps *Tri-band Wi-Fi delivers more Wi-Fi to more devices *Quad Stream delivers up to four data streams per Wi-Fi band *4 active and 4 internal antennas to amplify and maximize range *6 Gigabit Ethernet ports, aggregate two for fast file transfers *Smart Connect intelligently selects Wi-Fi band for every device *MU-MIMO for simultaneous streaming of data to multiple devices *Dynamic QoS prioritizes bandwidth by application and device ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4GHz (DualCore ARM Cortex A9) *Memory: 128 MB Flash (NAND) and 512 MB RAM (DDR3) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] *DualBand, NitroQAM 5GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4GHz (600Mbps) *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP: Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1+LAN2) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::1680 g]] ===See also=== *[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] __NOTOC__
